sentences.en: Don't be a rat fink, Jack.
sentences.cn: 不要可恶地打小报告, 杰克.

sentences.en: He is a fink . He has copped out.
sentences.cn: 他是个工贼, 他妥协了.

sentences.en: If I find the fink who informed on me, he will be punished.
sentences.cn: 如果给我找出哪个卑鄙小人出卖我, 他会受到惩罚的.

sentences.en: If you fink the agreement satisfactory, we can sign it in the same afternoon.
sentences.cn: 伯恩:假如你对协议感到满意, 我们就在那天下午签字.

sentences.en: Several months later, Mr. Fink paved the way to be involved in the problems at AIG.
sentences.cn: 几个月后, 芬克为插手AIG的问题铺平了道路.

sentences.en: The system is dialing back risk substantially , bringing down leverage, Mr. Fink said.
sentences.cn: 芬克说,金融系统正大幅降低风险 、 收缩杠杆.

words.tran_cn: 告发人，密告人；破坏及反罢工的人；乞丐

trans.tran_cn: 破坏及反罢工的人，告发人，密告人，乞丐
trans.tran_en: someone who tells the police, a teacher, or a parent when someone else breaks a rule or a law
